data.text: @SSI_dk But if you're at it, how about the sentence "And the absolute number of deaths has not been going up." Not clear if you talk about Covid deaths or excess mortality, but Covid deaths went up a lot. And excess mortality is >4z for the third week now according to the SSI/EuroMOMO. https://t.co/KMIqiR3gxM

@SSI_dk This is about much more than one typo. The misinformation pages systematically slant the data. It's a disgrace, and very sad, given the excellent science the SSI performs and the great data it produces.

@dominiksteiger Hi Dominik,
Sorry for the typo. It has now been corrected.
@CBroendsholmA @_mbdr_ @dominiksteiger @SSI_dk I'm looking for a removal of the entire embarrassing page.

@dominiksteiger Ah you're right. It looks like they mixed up "of" and "with" here. 30-40% are marked as "with" on the graph under the green/purple distinction - meaning 70-60% of covid deaths are "bc of" covid.

It's a classic mistake, but now that @SSI_dk knows, I'm sure they will correct it.

Given a population of 566'000 people of age >75 in Denmark, these 800 weekly deaths are 0.14% of the 75+ population. With a 7d incidence of 1'200, this amounts to 9.5 deaths, with 2'400 to 19 deaths to be expected to occur independently from Covid+ status.
